txt.en: If you would like to skip the remainder of the introduction and be transported to Thorin's Gate, speak with Dwalin.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest must be completed before the introduction is complete.</rgb>

'Done enough reminiscing, have you?'


If you choose to skip the introductory tutorial experience, you will be transported to Thorin's Gate after the defeat of the Dourhands and will be unable to travel to Thorin's Gate prior to those events.

Are you sure you want to continue?
Allows you to skip directly through the Introduction and begin your adventure in Middle-earth.
Talk to Dwalin to skip the Introduction
If you would like to skip the remainder of the Introduction and be transported to Thorin's Gate, speak with Dwalin.
